name: Go Rise Ltd.
description: Developer of a wealth management platform intended to solve the financial problems of migrants. The company offers banking and financial services to low-income, unbanked, and underbanked migrant workers in the United Arab Emirates, enabling users to manage their finances, learn new skills, and build a better future.
one_liner: Developer of a wealth management platform intended to solve the financial problems of migrants. The company offers banking and financial services to low-income, unbanked, and underbanked migrant workers in the United Arab Emirates, enabling users to manage their finances, learn new skills, and build a better future.
